operations.content:
version: '3'
scenarios:
  - name: gap_route_convert_to_real_php
    description: Stabilize route /api/convert-to-real.php
    events:
      - event_id: 1
        type: http_request
        url: /api/convert-to-real.php
        method: POST
        headers:
          Content-Type: application/json
        body: {}
      - event_id: 2
        type: http_request
        url: /api/convert-to-real.php
        method: GET
        headers:
          Content-Type: application/json
        body: {}
